alert.note: Alert for Lake (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued March 12 at 9:49AM EST until March 12 at 10:15AM EST by NWS Melbourne
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1015 AM EST FOR SEMINOLE...SOUTHEASTERN LAKE...NORTHWESTERN BREVARD...ORANGE AND VOLUSIA COUNTIES... At 948 AM EST, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Ormond Beach to Altamonte Springs to near Lake Louisa, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Orlando, Deltona, Daytona Beach, Port Orange and Sanford. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 1100 AM EST for east central Florida. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with these storms, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
